Hi,

During our last (broad) crawl we stumbled upon the following fact:
dir=
ectly after the start of the crawl the download rate (kb/s as
tracked in th=
e progress-statistics.log) was quite high. But this did
not even last for 1=
 hour. After that the download rate went down
significantly and continued d=
ecreasing during the rest of the crawl
(2-3 weeks).

Does anyone of you hav=
e a clue how this behaviour can be explained? We
did not have a similar beh=
aviour in previous crawls.

Thanks & best regards,

Nathalie Steinmetz
